head.title: Alexandra Daly and Michael Clurman Are Engaged to Be Married in May

hedline.hl1: Alexandra Daly and Michael Clurman Are Engaged to Be Married in May

LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Peter S. Maher of Washington have announced May wedding plans for Mrs. Maher's daughter, Alexandra Elise Daly, and Richard Michael Clurman Jr., the son of Mr. and Mrs. Clurman of New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Peter S. Maher of Washington have announced May wedding plans for Mrs. Maher's daughter, Alexandra Elise Daly, and Richard Michael Clurman Jr., the son of Mr. and Mrs. Clurman of New York.

Miss Daly, 25 years old, is a graduate of the McBurney School and Barnard College. She is the fashion editorial director at the Keeble, Cavaco & Duka public relations and advertising concern in New York. Her mother, Jeanne Maher, is a lawyer who formerly practiced in Washington. Her stepfather is an investor.

The prospective bridegroom, 31, who is known as Michael, is a founding partner of the Capital Hill Group, an investment-banking firm in New York. He is a graduate of the Collegiate School and Sarah Lawrence College. His mother, Shirley Clurman, is an associate producer of ''20/20'' on ABC.

His father is a writer and the chairman of the Columbia University Seminars on Media and Society. He was a vice president and the chief of correspondents at Time Inc. and a New York City Commissioner of Parks and Cultural Affairs in the administration of Mayor John V. Lindsay.
